```{sh}
mkdir /opt/stanford-corenlp
cd /opt/stanford-corenlp
wget http://nlp.stanford.edu/software/stanford-corenlp-full-2017-06-09.zip
unzip stanford-corenlp-full-2017-06-09

wget http://nlp.stanford.edu/software/stanford-german-corenlp-2017-06-09-models.jar


sudo unzip stanford-german-corenlp-2017-06-09-models.jar StanfordCoreNLP-german.properties
sudo zip -d stanford-german-corenlp-2017-06-09-models.jar StanfordCoreNLP-german.properties
```
